name: df-flim
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cflim, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, cuni(crn(cfil)), crab(s2, cuni(cv(s0)), wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s2))), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cpw(cuni(cv(s0))))))))
comment: Define a function (indexed by a topology ` j ` ) whose value is the limits of a filter ` f ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Sep-2009.)
